info.description: AI-powered SaaS platform for automated analysis of scientific publications
info.title: PaperScraper

get.description: Root endpoint with API info.
List alerts for the current user.

post.description: Create a new alert for a saved search.

get.description: Get an alert by ID.
Get the history/results for an alert.

post.description: Test an alert by running its search without sending notification.
Manually trigger an alert (useful for testing).

get.description:
Get benchmark comparisons against platform averages.

Compares organization metrics against anonymized aggregates from all organizations:
- Papers per month
- Scoring velocity (% of papers scored)
- Pipeline conversion rate (% reaching contacted stage)

Get dashboard summary with key metrics.

Returns aggregated metrics including paper counts, scoring stats,
project counts, and trends for the last 30 days.

Get innovation funnel analytics.

Shows the progression of papers through stages:
Imported -> Scored -> In Pipeline -> Contacted -> Transferred

Returns stage counts and conversion rates.

Get paper analytics.

Returns import trends, scoring distributions, and top papers.

Get team overview statistics.

Returns user counts, activity metrics, and per-user statistics.

List audit logs for the organization.

Only admins can view audit logs.
Get the current user's own activity log.

schema.title: Response Get My Activity Api V1 Audit My Activity Get

get.description:
Get recent activity for a specific user.

Only admins can view user activity logs.

schema.title: Response Get User Activity Api V1 Audit Users  User Id  Get

post.description:
Accept a team invitation and create account.

This is a public endpoint (no auth required).

Change the current user's password.

Requires the current password for verification.

delete.description:
Permanently delete account and all associated data.

GDPR Article 17: Right to erasure ("right to be forgotten").

Requires password confirmation. If the user is the sole admin of an
organization, they must set delete_organization=true to delete the
entire organization and all its data.

WARNING: This action is irreversible!

get.description:
Export all user and organization data as JSON.

GDPR Article 20: Right to data portability.
Returns all data associated with the user's account and organization.

post.description:
Request a password reset email.

Always returns success to prevent email enumeration.

get.description:
Get invitation details for the accept-invite page.

This is a public endpoint (no auth required).

List all pending invitations for the organization.

Only admins can view invitations.

schema.title: Response List Invitations Api V1 Auth Invitations Get

delete.description:
Cancel a pending invitation.

Only admins can cancel invitations.

post.description:
Invite a new user to join the organization.

Only admins can send invitations.

Authenticate a user with email and password.

Returns JWT access and refresh tokens on successful authentication.

Logout the current user and invalidate their access token.

The access token will be added to the blacklist and cannot be reused.
For full security, clients should also discard the refresh token.

get.description: Get the currently authenticated user's profile with organization details.

patch.description:
Update the currently authenticated user's profile.

Only modifiable fields (full_name, preferences) can be updated.

post.description: Mark the current user's onboarding as complete.
Upload organization logo to storage (admin only).

get.description: Return the effective permissions for the current user based on their role.

schema.title: Response Get My Permissions Api V1 Auth Permissions Get

post.description:
Get new access and refresh tokens using a valid refresh token.

The old refresh token should be discarded after calling this endpoint.

Register a new user and create their organization.

This endpoint creates:
- A new organization with the provided name and type
- A new user as the admin of that organization

Returns JWT tokens for immediate authentication.
post.summary: Register a new user and organization

post.description:
Resend email verification link.

Always returns success to prevent email enumeration.
Reset password using token from email.

get.description: Return all available roles and their associated permissions (admin only).

schema.title: Response List Roles Api V1 Auth Roles Get

get.summary: List available roles and their permissions

get.description:
List all users in the organization.

Only admins can list users.

post.description:
Deactivate a user account.

Only admins can deactivate users. Cannot deactivate self.

Reactivate a deactivated user account.

Only admins can reactivate users.

patch.description:
Update a user's role.

Only admins can change user roles. Cannot change own role.

post.description:
Unlock a user account that was locked due to failed login attempts.

Only admins can unlock accounts.
Verify email address with token received via email.

get.description: List all authors with papers in the organization.
Get an author's profile with basic stats.

post.description: Log a contact/outreach attempt with an author.

get.description: Get contact statistics for an author.
Get full author detail with papers and contact history.

post.description: Enrich author data from external sources (OpenAlex, ORCID, etc.).

get.description: List all available badges (system + organization-specific).
Get badges earned by the current user.

post.description: Check and award any newly earned badges for the current user.

get.description: Get current user's activity statistics and gamification level.

Search and filter audit logs with pagination.

Admin only. Provides enhanced filtering beyond the basic /audit endpoint.

Export audit logs as CSV file.

Admin only. Exports all matching logs for compliance reporting.

Get aggregated audit log statistics.

Admin only. Provides summary for compliance dashboards.

Get GDPR data processing transparency information.

Admin only. Shows where and how data is processed.

List all retention policies for the organization.

Admin only.

post.description:
Create a new retention policy.

Admin only. Only one policy per entity type is allowed.

Apply retention policies now.

Admin only. Use dry_run=true to preview without actually deleting data.

get.description:
List retention policy application logs.

Admin only. Shows history of retention policy executions.

delete.description:
Delete a retention policy.

Admin only.

patch.description:
Update a retention policy.

Admin only.

get.description:
Get evidence documentation for a specific SOC2 control.

Admin only. Returns evidence items and links for auditor review.

post.description:
Export SOC2 status report for auditor review.

Admin only. Generates a comprehensive report of all controls.

get.description:
Get SOC2 Type II control implementation status.

optionally with scoring information and abstracts.
Export papers to RIS format for reference managers.
List researcher groups.

with LLM-generated explanations.

get.description: List papers with pagination and optional full-text search.

Upload a PDF file and extract paper metadata.

- PDF magic bytes validated
- PDF EOF marker validated
- Maximum file size: 50MB

that is accessible to general audiences (max 150 words).

post.description: Execute a saved search and return results.

delete.description: Revoke the share link for a saved search.

post.description: Generate a shareable link for a saved search.

get.description:
List all paper scores for the organization.

Returns the latest score per paper, ordered by overall score descending.

post.description:
Classify multiple papers in batch.

Returns classification results for each paper.

schema.title: Response Batch Classify Papers Api V1 Scoring Classification Batch Post

get.description: Get papers that haven't been classified yet.

schema.title: Response Get Unclassified Papers Api V1 Scoring Classification Unclassified Get

get.description: List all scoring jobs for the organization.

post.description: Create an async scoring job and enqueue background processing.

get.description: Get status of a scoring job.

post.description:
Classify a paper into a category using LLM.

Categories: Original Research, Review, Case Study, Methodology,
Theoretical, Commentary, Preprint, Other.

Generate vector embedding for a paper.

Embeddings are used for semantic similarity search to find
related papers for scoring context.

Score a paper across all AI dimensions.

Triggers scoring for novelty, IP potential, marketability,
feasibility, and commercialization dimensions.

Rate limited to prevent excessive LLM API calls.

get.description: Get all scores for a paper with pagination.
Get the most recent score for a paper.

post.description: Search papers using full-text, semantic, or hybrid mode.
Start a background job to generate embeddings for papers without them.

get.description: Get statistics about paper embeddings.
Search papers using PostgreSQL trigram similarity.
Search papers using embedding similarity.

post.description: Find papers similar to a given paper using embedding similarity.

get.description: Find papers similar to a given paper (simplified GET endpoint).
List all AI model configurations for the organization.

get.description: Get aggregated model usage statistics.

delete.description: Delete a model configuration. Admin only.

patch.description: Update a model configuration. Admin only.

get.description: Get hosting and compliance information for a model configuration.
List all submissions in the organization (manager/admin only).

post.description: Create a new research submission as a draft.

get.description: List submissions created by the current user.
Get submission details including attachments and scores.

patch.description: Update a draft submission (own submissions only).

post.description: Run AI scoring analysis on a submission (manager/admin only).

Upload a file attachment to a submission.

Supported formats: PDF, DOC, DOCX, PPT, PPTX, PNG, JPEG.
Maximum file size: 50MB.

get.description:
Download a submission attachment via pre-signed URL.

Redirects to a time-limited pre-signed S3 URL.

post.description: Convert a submission into a paper (manager/admin only).

patch.description: Approve or reject a submission (manager/admin only).

post.description: Submit a draft for TTO review.

Add a message to a conversation using a template.

get.description: Get AI-suggested next steps for a conversation.

post.description: Attach a resource to a conversation.

Upload a file as a resource to a conversation.

Maximum file size: 50MB.
